dlgLine.text: I've called you all here because as you already know, I have been unhappy with the leadership here. Well, I say it's time to stop griping about it and take some cold, hard action.
<To you> You've repeatedly risked the lives of everyone here and taken actions that were reckless, idiotic, and downright criminal! I made a mistake trusting you.
I'm ready to take charge and set this place on the right path. And you can be damn sure my first act will be to kick our current leadership to the curb. Now - who's with me?
<To you>This is a serious proposal... If Vic has overwhelming support, he will be elected as the rightful leader of this place.
The current morale around here tells me that...
I'm afraid the people here aren't going to accept a change of leadership right now.
Given their feelings about our current leadership, the people here would accept this change.
Vic is within his rights to propose this change...
However, I support <charname> as leader.
And I'm in agreement with him about our current leadership. We need a change.
Let's see. Do I stand to gain anything from this...
No, I don't. So... that's a no from me.
Probably. My vote's yours if you need it, Castillo.
I'm no fan of cops - you all know that...
So, fuck Vic. My support is firmly for the current leadership.
So you know shit's messed up when I'm ready to give Vic a shot.
Basing my vote on what people are telling me about the leadership here...
I don't think people here will support this change.
I believe the people will support this.
I've given this some thought, and I believe our only option at this point...
Is to stay the course. I'm sorry, Vic, but I can't support you.
Is to elect new leadership. I'm sorry, <charname>, I can't support you.
The votes have been cast...
The majority of the votes are in favor of removing you from the shelter.
And for my first act as leader, for your own safety, I am exiling you from the school. Resist and you will be shot. Let's go.

dlgAnsw.text: Wait! Let's talk! Davis? Someone?! Don't throw me out!
Ingrates... I hope Vic gets you all killed. And then, when you're at your weakest, I will finish you all off!
You sons of bitches! After all I did for you! I want a recount!

dlgLine.text: The majority of the votes are in favor of keeping you as leader.

dlgAnsw.text: Good... Then this meeting is over.
Not so fast, Vic - I cannot let what you did go unpunished.

dlgLine.text: I did what I thought needed to be done... You do what you have to.

dlgAnsw.text: Hmm... You're lucky I still need you. For now, you can stay.
I'm going to shake hands, and I'm going to put this behind us. For the sake of the shelter.
If the people support you so much, they can feed you. No rations for a week.
For attempting mutiny against me, you will be exiled from this shelter immediately.
For your betrayal, I sentence you to death. To be carried out immediately. <Kill Vic>

dlgLine.text: Well, I appreciate that you'll let me continue to watch out for these people. That's all I've been trying to do... It's more than I was willing to do for you.
That's... that's big of you. More than I would do.
For the sake of everyone here, yes, I'm willing to put this behind us.
...I can take it.
I was only looking out for the people here. But I swear... if I see you out there, we will settle this for good - you understand me?
<Vic watches the blood drip through his fingers.>
...This will happen again... You goddamn... cowards...

dlgAnsw.text: <Vic is dragged out and the meeting is adjourned.>

dlgLine.text: I believe this meeting is over.

dlgAnsw.text: <You remain in control of the shelter.>
